overview:
Alvaro Teijeiro is co-founder and CTO of Fnbox.com, a technology company focused on creating global Internet businesses. Alvaro leads Fnbox’s product development & software engineering teams, and is a Member of the Board.

During the past 10 years, Alvaro has participated in the start-up and management of successful products and companies such as Sonico.com, TarjetasTelefonicas.com, Recarga.com, Datam.com and Cuponica.com

Alvaro’s experience has included:

  • Leading the tech & product teams for growing and scaling Sonico.com to over +55 million registered users
  • Designing and executing PPC and SEO strategies that fueled TarjetasTelefonicas to +30.000 monthly transactions
  • Recruiting and managing a world-class engineering, product and business intelligence team (+40 headcount)
  • Participated in raising $6.4 MM in venture funding
  • Speaker at events related to technology, entrepreneurship and online marketing (Barcamp, Ecommerceday, South American Business Forum)

Alvaro has a particular passion for tech startups, open source technologies, and the overall challenge of iterating from idea to reality.
